post.body: tonite i have a migraine. usually i can block the pain, but lately the old tricks aren't workin :( gonna call it a nite soon
but glad I don't glow, because i can pass in public for a few hours with high pain if i have to
but i curled my hair a bit, put on makeup, and felt so much better when I saw his eyes light up :)
today i was glad you couldn't see pain, because i'd have looked radioactive!
if ya need help with the blog, let me know, we'll help where we can :)
we just never let anyone see us on our bad days :D
wouldn't know it to look at us, tho, i'm in the best physical shape i've ever been in, and he's an ex bodybuilder still lean
lol so long as you can stand clutter :) i'm chaotic, he's order. drives him crazy, but i'm cool with it. lol
thanks :) hubby and i both have chronic pain, i think it shows in our work :) We have a great deal of passion in our art
anxiety, chronic unexplained pain (poss fibro?), get real bad reaction to chemicals, so pot's about all i can do for pain
only been daily for about 3 years now
still new to it, tho, to be honest. started in '00 by recommend from doctor
i prefer smoking, I like to watch the smoke swirl in the air :) bad way to start a habit, but so pretty sometimes
very sensitive palate, i barely season anything, i get drowned in too many flavors
i'm a picky eater, and a smoker anyway, so I just burn it :)
oh, i strained it good, but the flavor was way heavy. not sure i did it right.. lol
i guess i just haven't found a good recipe for me. I tried making popcorn balls, lol, those were fun... i colored them green
sorry, back now... I never liked the taste, myself. Too "green" tasting for me, not a veggie eater :) lol
morning :) Well... noon-ish :)
afternoon to ya :)
morning sweetheart *kiss*
cheap for a lot, but know your prices, sometimes you can get a better deal with sales at freddys or albertsons
i can make her bounce from side to side :) Takes me a min or two, but then it all falls into place!
LMAO poor doggy!
yes, I met and started following @RGebbiePhoto quite a while ago :D
Let inspiration take you to new places! http://www.RGebbiePhoto.blogspot.com
Dealing with a migraine. Don't you hate working when you have a headache?? ugh...
WOOT!! Portland OR is iced in, chains req on all hwys. Vanc light dusting, silver thaw on it's way!
I'm so happy, it's supposed to snow tonite! Snow=freeze=ice=silver thaw. Oh the pictures I'm gonna take! WOOT!
Gonna be a great day, migraine is GONE
One of the best people search tools I've ever run across :D http://www.cvgadget.com/
Are you right or left brained? Which way does she turn? http://is.gd/cSYT

Oh yeah, back to keywording :) Ahh, the words never end....
